Toronto
Washington DC


 July 18, 2018 $85-100K DOE Toronto, Ontario C++ 
A growing organization in the heart of downtown Toronto is looking to expand their development team with a Senior C++/QT Developer.  This company is looking to revolutionize the way people experience live events!  With a growing product base and an all-time high demand, they are looking to develop new applications that require skilled professional developers.
This organization is looking for an Engineer with strong C++ skills in a Linux environment, ideally using QT. The ideal candidate will have experience with both embedded and application level development and have a strong desire to work on cutting edge and R&D style projects.
Required Skills & Experience
5+ years of C++ and QT development experience
Experience in a Linux environment
Experience with both application and embedded level development
Ability to work in a fast paced, diverse team
Experience with SaaS based platforms
Bachelors or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or Engineering
Strong written and oral communication
Desired Skills & Experience
Previous experience with R&D style environments
Previous Mobile application development experience
Computer Vision experience
What You Will Be Doing
Tech Breakdown
80% C++ development
20% QT development
Daily Responsibilities
80% Hands On
10% Architecture and Design
10% Team Collaboration
The Offer
Competitive Salary: Up to $100K/year, DOE
You will receive the following benefits:
Statutory Vacation
Holiday Pay
Bonus program
Fantastic work culture
Working on cutting edge applications
 
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in Canada on a full-time basis now and in the future.
This position does not offer sponsorship.
 
Jobspring Partners, part of the Motion Recruitment network, provides IT Staffing Solutions (Contract, Contract-to-Hire, and Direct Hire) across 10 major North American markets. Our unique expertise in today’s highest demand tech skill sets, paired with our deep networks and knowledge of our local technology markets, results in an exemplary track record with candidates and clients.
 A growing organization in the heart of downtown Toronto is looking to expand their development team with a Senior C++/QT Developer.  This company is looking to revolutionize the way people experience live events!  With a growing product base and an all-time high demand, they are looking to develop new applications that require skilled professional developers. This organization is looking for an Engineer with strong C++ skills in a Linux environment, ideally using QT. The ideal candidate will have experience with both embedded and application level development and have a strong desire to work on cutting edge and R&D style projects.
